ぽっち: (ぽっち) - (often as っぽっち)  a little/paltry/piddling/mere; stud/chad
ぽっちり: (ぽっちり) - very slightly; a little
ぽっつり: (ぽっつり) - (ぽっつり is emphatic) isolated/standing alone; falling in drops (e.g. rain); saying a single word/muttering just a few words
ぽっと: (ぽっと) - slightly (blushing); suddenly (getting bright, flaring up, flashing on, etc.); distractedly
ぽつねんと: (ぽつねんと) - solitarily; in a lonely fashion; all alone; by oneself
ぽつぽつ: (ぽつぽつ) - bit by bit; piece by piece; spots; pimples
ぽつり: (ぽっつり) - (ぽっつり is emphatic) isolated/standing alone; falling in drops (e.g. rain); saying a single word/muttering just a few words
ぽつりぽつり: (ぽつりぽつり) - intermittently/bit by bit/little by little/by ones and twos; in drops (e.g. of rain)
ぽつん: (ぽっつり) - (ぽっつり is emphatic) isolated/standing alone; falling in drops (e.g. rain); saying a single word/muttering just a few words
ぽとぽと: (ぽとぽと) - trickle down in thick drops
ぽとり: (ぽとり) - with a "plop" (of tears, drop of water, etc.)
ぽとりと落ちる: (ぽとりとおちる) - to fall down with a "plop"
ぽにょぽにょ: (ポニョポニョ) - to be fat
ぽろっと: (ぽろっと) - water drops or tears falling one by one; something falling suddenly
ぽろり: (ぽろり) - crying/tears dripping/water dripping/grain-like object falling; falling off/falling down; inadvertently coming to the surface
ぽろろん: (ぽろろん) - strumming; thrumming; plunking; plonking
ぽん: (ぽん) - with a slap/with a pop/with a plop; without batting an eyelid; generously
ぽんこつ: (ぽんこつ) - piece of junk (esp. dismantled or broken down car)/worn-out article; hitting (with fist)/striking
ぽんじり: (ぽんじり) - pope's nose; parson's nose; meat from around the coccyx of a chicken
ぽんぽこ: (ぽんぽこ) - sounding of a drum or hand drum/sound of drums; full (stomach)/bursting
ぽんぽん: (ぽんぽん) - pompon/pompons/bobbles; tummy/tumtum; bang-bang/pop-pop/tap-tap; without reservation/unreservedly/snappishly/outspokenly
まあ: (ま) - (when urging or consoling) just (e.g. "just wait here")/come now/now, now; tolerably/passably/moderately/reasonably/fairly/rather/somewhat; (when hesitating to express an opinion) well.../I think.../it would seem.../you might say.../Hmmm, I guess so...; oh!/oh dear!/oh, my!/wow!/goodness gracious!/good heavens!
まあまあ: (まあまあ) - so-so; now, now (used in calming people down); my, my (expression of wonder, surprise, etc.)
まい: (まい) - probably isn't (doesn't, won't, etc.); don't (doesn't) intend to/intend not to; must not/(when used in an imperative sentence) don't
まいう: (まいう) - (うまい said backwards)  delicious
まいうー: (まいう) - (うまい said backwards)  delicious
まいか: (まいか) - (used to make a request, etc.) won't you
まいに: (まいに) - even though it is not; despite not
まいゆ: (まいゆう) - (reversed from うまい) delicious/appetizing/appetising; skillful/clever/expert/wise/successful; fortunate/splendid/promising
まいゆう: (まいゆう) - (reversed from うまい) delicious/appetizing/appetising; skillful/clever/expert/wise/successful; fortunate/splendid/promising
まい進: (まいしん) - pushing forward (undaunted, bravely); working vigorously towards an aim; struggling on; striving towards
まかり通る: (makaritooru) - ficar impune, ser tolerado, ser permitido, ser ignorado
まかり間違う: (まかりまちがう) - to go wrong; to turn for the worse
まき散らす: (まきちらす) - to scatter; to spread
まき込む: (まきこむ) - to roll up; to involve; to enfold; to swallow up; to drag into
まくし立てる: (まくしたてる) - to talk on and on; to rattle on; to keep on talking (without pause)
まくり上げる: (まくりあげる) - to tuck (e.g. sleeves); to roll up
まぐれ当たり: (まぐれあたり) - lucky shot; fluke
まぐわう: (まぐわう) - (from 目合ひ; まぐわい) to have sexual intercourse
まごまご: (magomago) - confuso, atrapalhado, sem saber o que fazer
まさかの時: (まさかのとき) - in time of need; for a rainy day; in case of emergency
まし: (まし) - (used to make a polite request or demand)  please; used to increase the politeness of a greeting, apology, etc.
ましなんだ: (ませんだった) - suffix used to negate a verb in the past tense
ましょ: (まひょ) - (ましょ is a colloquialism in standard Japanese; まひょ is a colloquialism in Kansai dialect)  (used to express the speaker's volition) I'll; (used to make an invitation, request, etc.) let's; (used to express a conjecture) probably
ましょう: (まひょ) - (ましょ is a colloquialism in standard Japanese; まひょ is a colloquialism in Kansai dialect)  (used to express the speaker's volition) I'll; (used to make an invitation, request, etc.) let's; (used to express a conjecture) probably
ましょうか: (ましょうか) - shall I?; shall we?
まじ: (まぢ) - serious (not capricious or flirtatious); (まじ only)  cannot/should not/will not/must not
まじい: (まじい) - should not be; must not be
まじき: (まじき) - should not be; must not be
まじまじと見る: (まじまじとみる) - to take a long hard look at something
ますです体: (ますですたい) - literary form imparting the nuance of polite speech (with sentences ending in "desu" and verbs ending in "masu")
ます目: (ますめ) - measure; square (e.g. of graph paper or Japanese manuscript paper); box (e.g. on a form)
まずあり得ない: (まずありえない) - very improbable; vanishingly unlikely; only with a miracle
まず以って: (まずもって) - first of all; in the first place
まず以て: (まずもって) - first of all; in the first place
まず隗より始めよ: (まずかいよりはじめよ) - start with the first step/when embarking on a great project, start with immediate steps; he who first suggests it should be the first to do it
ませ: (まし) - (used to make a polite request or demand)  please; used to increase the politeness of a greeting, apology, etc.
ませなんだ: (ませんだった) - suffix used to negate a verb in the past tense
ません: (ません) - suffix used to negate a verb in the non-past tense
ませんか: (ませんか) - (used to ask a question in the negative)  won't (hasn't, isn't, doesn't, etc.); (used to make invitations, express desires or give indirect commands) won't you
ませんかった: (ませんだった) - suffix used to negate a verb in the past tense
ませんだった: (ませんだった) - suffix used to negate a verb in the past tense
ませんでした: (ませんでした) - suffix used to negate a verb in the past tense
またぎ: (まとぎ) - ancient hunting communities in Tohoku
またたく間に: (またたくまに) - in the twinkling of an eye; in a flash
またね: (じゃまたね) - good-bye; see you later
また上: (またがみ) - waist (the part of the pants located above the crotch); pant rise
また会う日まで: (またあうひまで) - till we meet again
また来週: (またらいしゅう) - See you next week
また聞き: (またぎき) - hearsay; learning by hearsay
また逢う日まで: (またあうひまで) - till we meet again
まだまだこれから: (まだまだこれから) - it's not over yet; you haven't seen anything yet; it's not over until the fat lady sings; it's too soon to tell; we're not out of the woods
まぢ: (まぢ) - serious (not capricious or flirtatious); (まじ only)  cannot/should not/will not/must not
まったく気にかけない: (まったくきにかけない) - not be concerned about at all; not be troubled by; to not care about
まったく気にならない: (まったくきにならない) - not be concerned about at all; not mind about at all; not care a bit
まっぴらご免: (まっぴらごめん) - had enough/flatly refusing/wouldn't do for anything; begging pardon
